commit.message:
Rollup merge of #105411 - estebank:short-names, r=oli-obk

Introduce `with_forced_trimmed_paths`

Built on top of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/104922, only last commit is relevant.

verification.payload:
tree e0ba2e51d9f9fcc4929435a24ed21fb88dd01172
parent e1c91213ff80af5b87a197b784b40bcbc8cf3add
parent 17547af3fb3ee04d922a0fb7a71e74547d18695e
author Matthias Krüger <matthias.krueger@famsik.de> 1670748716 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1670748716 +0100

Rollup merge of #105411 - estebank:short-names, r=oli-obk

Introduce `with_forced_trimmed_paths`

Built on top of https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/104922, only last commit is relevant.
